title: Yoga Nidra for Sleep - Guided Meditation to Help You Drift into Deep,Restful Sleep #yoganidra #sleep
description:
Yoga nidra is the ultimate relaxation technique for releasing stress and tension held in the body. This yoga nidra will help you drift off into a deep, restful sleep, it is 60 minutes in total.  
Please remember to silence notifications on your device and switch auto play off so you won't be disturbed by the next video. Ads have been removed at the end of the video so no jarring adverts to wake you up. 
I hope you enjoy it, Sweet Dreams
Om Shanti 
Lizzy x
channelDescription:
Hi and welcome to my channel.  

My goal is making meditation and relaxation easier and more accessible for everyone.

Why not check out my podcast, Spiritually Speaking with Liz, available on most podcast platforms. Please follow and click the notification icon for weekly updates

Like my facebook page:

comments: Finally, Thank you for not talking in some weird cadence and not quite a talk or whisper with weird annunciation.  ThAnk You.
What do you do when you wake up at 4:33 am and want to sleep longer? You come here and put this video on! Worked like a charm! Thanks! Zzzzzzed restfully! Time for coffee!
I have tried many different yoga nidras and yours is the only one that works everytime.  Thank you!
I have done yr yoga nidra for years...also passed it on to others. Thank you

I love your no nonsense video's. Ive tried other Yoga Nidra videos but they ramble on. I like that you speak softy, but normally. Your content is clear. If im still awake when your video has finished, i start again.
If i go to bed with a busy mind, i pop your one of your video's again.
Thank you so much Lizzy Hill. You are a god send.
